scripts.compile-reset: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url true scss/reset/c-reset.scss dist/reset.min.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r dist/reset.min.css
scripts.compile-base: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/base/c-base.scss dist/base.min.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r dist/base.min.css
scripts.compile-components: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/components/c-components.scss dist/component.min.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r dist/component.min.css
scripts.compile-lego: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/lego.scss dist/lego.min.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r dist/lego.min.css
scripts.compile-demo: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/demo.scss dist/demo.min.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r dist/demo.min.css
scripts.build: npm run compile-reset && npm run compile-base && npm run compile-components && npm run compile-lego && npm run compile-demo
